ENONewProductHdr.Title: New Product
ENONewProductHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, the required attributes if any, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click <uicontrol>Create and Close</uicontrol> to create only one product, or <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> to create another one.
ENOInsertNewProductHdr.Title: Insert New Product
ENOInsertNewProductHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a new product and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ENOInsertNewProductHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click Create and Close to create only one product, or Create to create another one.
